column4: first time wubi install, clean install of XP on this box, hasn't been connected to net yet for updates, first thing I tried to install is ubuntu 9.10 64 bit via the install cd, but I can't get ubuntu to boot, don't see a grub menu or anything
succeed, but still can't find a reason as to why I can't boot into ubuntu
not sure im afraid - my wubi install (it was a while ago) worked ootb im afraid
